item.title: Narrated Bus Tour of Bar Harbor and Acadia National Park
item.description: Take a deep dive into Bar Harbor, Acadia National Park, and Mt. Desert Island on this half-day bus tour. Since your transportation is provided, you can focus on the scenery and taking in the insightful narrative instead of driving and directions. Make three stops within the town of Bar Harbor and the National Park to witness firsthand the views and wildlife that make this island so special. Stops include Cadillac Mountain, Sieur de Monts Spring, and Thunder Hole.

image.alt: Narrated Bus Tour of Bar Harbor and Acadia National Park

item.title: Premium Narrated Bus Tour of Bar Harbor and Acadia National Park (3.5 Hours)
item.description: Known for its rocky coastlines, wealth of wildlife, and evergreen forests, Acadia National Park promises dramatic scenery—and this fully narrated driving tour makes for an easy way to discover it. Set off from Bar Harbor in a luxury Berkshire minibus, and discover highlights like Cadillac Mountain (the highest point on the East Coast), Thunder Hole (where ocean waves roar), Sieur De Mont's Spring, Jordan Pond, and much more.

image.alt: Premium Narrated Bus Tour of Bar Harbor and Acadia National Park (3.5 Hours)

item.title: Self-Guided Ebike Tours of Acadia National Park Carriage Roads
item.description: If you’re planning to explore Acadia National Park but would like to do so on your own time without a group holding you back, this Acadia National Park e-bike Rental is the perfect solution. This e-bike rental gives you an e-bike and all the equipment you need for a day roaming the park’s carriage roads, as well as Park Loop Road. Plus, with an e-bike, you decide when to be active.

image.alt: Self-Guided Ebike Tours of Acadia National Park Carriage Roads

item.title: 3 Hour Private Tour: Explore all the top spots of Acadia!
item.description: Make the most of your visit to Maine's Acadia National Park during this private, half-day guided tour. Find routes and trails that are difficult to locate for most visitors. Cover the Park Loop Road, with panoramic views from Cadillac Mountain. Tours include snacks, refreshments, and private transfers in a climate-controlled vehicle.

image.alt: 3 Hour Private Tour: Explore all the top spots of Acadia!

item.title: 4 Hour Private Tour: Explore Acadia Nat'l Park, Fjord & Mansions
item.description: Explore the highlights of Maine's Acadia National Park during this private, half-day guided tour. Get personalized recommendations and information from your tour guide. Cover the Park Loop Road, with panoramic views from Cadillac Mountain—no climbing necessary. Tours include private transfers in a climate-controlled vehicle.

image.alt: 4 Hour Private Tour: Explore Acadia Nat'l Park, Fjord & Mansions

item.title: Guided Ebike Tour of Acadia National Park Carriage Roads
item.description: Join our guided 22-mile tour of the Acadia National Park Carriage Roads on a high-quality class 1 e-bike. Our experienced tour guides are the only ones authorized to take you on this tour within the park. You will learn about the different land features, the history of the Carriage Roads, and the must-see sights along the way. We guarantee that this guided tour will help you make unforgettable memories during your vacation.

image.alt: Guided Ebike Tour of Acadia National Park Carriage Roads

item.title: 6 Hour Private Tour: Acadia National Park, Fjord & Lobster Lunch
item.description: Discover top sights within Acadia National Park with your own personal guide during this private, half-day tour. Cover more locations in less time in a comfortable, climate-controlled vehicle. Highlights include Park Loop Road and panoramic views from Cadillac Mountain. Tours include a stroll through Asticou Gardens, and a tasty lunch stop in Southwest Harbor (meal not included.)

image.alt: 6 Hour Private Tour: Acadia National Park, Fjord & Lobster Lunch

item.title: Savor Bar Harbor Culinary Walking Tour in Maine
item.description: Stroll through Bar Harbor with a small group on this tour focused on the local cuisine. As you walk, listen to in-depth commentary on the local food scene and stop for tastings at establishments around the Village Green. The tastings add up to a satisfying lunch, and the small group size means you'll have plenty of personalized attention and chances to ask questions.

image.alt: Savor Bar Harbor Culinary Walking Tour in Maine

item.title: Acadia Full Day Small Group Tour
item.description: Explore the beauty of a national park with the help of a naturalist guide to teach you all about the flora and fauna of the area’s land and sea. You’ll enjoy a mixture of hiking on and off the beaten track, and traveling in a comfortable, air-conditioned van. You’ll be walking and learning in an intimate group where you can pick the tour leader’s brain to your heart’s content.

image.alt: Acadia Full Day Small Group Tour

item.title: Acadia Full Day Private Tour and Hike
item.description: Join a guide who really knows their stuff for a full-day private tour of Acadia National Park that’s tailored to your interests. From popular sights like Thunder Hole and Jordan Pond to hiking off the beaten track, your group’s preferences will be considered every step of the way. While you walk, your naturalist tour leader will tell you stories of Acadia’s history and wildlife, and even stop to serve you lunch.

image.alt: Acadia Full Day Private Tour and Hike

item.title: Experience Bar Harbor with Thunder Hole and Acadia National Park
item.description: See the best of what Acadia National Park has to offer, from the tranquility of Sieur de Monts Spring to the excitement of the waves at Thunder Hole. Your tour will start with a convenient and comfortable car ride from your Bar Harbor hotel to the park, where your guide will take you to their favorite scenic spots and tell you all about the area.

image.alt: Experience Bar Harbor with Thunder Hole and Acadia National Park

item.title: Savor Bar Harbor Culinary Walking Tour
item.description: Immerse yourself in the food culture of Bar Harbor and Mt. Desert Island on this culinary-focused tour. This small island has a bustling food scene and this small-group tour lets sample the best that downtown Bar Harbor has to offer. Listen to commentary about the local food and agriculture as you taste; a small group means you have plenty of personalized attention and the chance to ask questions.

image.alt: Savor Bar Harbor Culinary Walking Tour

item.title: 90-minute Ghost Walking Tour in Bar Harbor
item.description:
On our ghost walk, you'll travel the sea-sprayed Shore Path, where you might catch a glimpse of a ghost or even a sea serpent. You'll learn the history behind a variety of mysterious local incidents and expand your knowledge of the supernatural with accounts of the three major types of ghosts: residual manifestations, intelligent hauntings, and poltergeists. The weird tales include the strange goings-on at otherwise opulent lodgings like the Balance Rock Inn, the legendary Bar Harbor Club, and several other paranormal hotspots about town.
Marcus LiBrizzi, author of Ghosts of Acadia and Haunted Islands in the Gulf of Maine, two of the authoritative books on Maine's haunted tales, calls our tour "an unforgettable, spine-tingling tour of Bar Harbor’s haunted sites." Join us to discover for yourself.

image.alt: 90-minute Ghost Walking Tour in Bar Harbor

item.title: Ultimate Acadia National Park Self-Guided Driving Audio Tour
item.description: Acadia National Park is as big as it is beautiful, making it simple to get lost when going on your own. Instead, choose this Acadia National Park Self-Guided Driving Audio Tour and see the park’s pristine wilderness while hearing about its history from the safety of your own vehicle. You’ll follow a route through the park on an easy-to-download app that gives recommended speed limits and commentary for a unique experience.

image.alt: Ultimate Acadia National Park Self-Guided Driving Audio Tour

item.title: Acadia National Park & Bar Harbor Self-Guided Driving & Walking Tour
item.description: A historic coastal Maine town, a classic national park: this self-guided experience gives you an opportunity to experience both the city of Bar Harbor and Acadia National Park. You’ll download a tour guide app that provides both a walking tour of Bar Harbor and a driving tour through nearby Acadia National Park. Follow the loop around the park then explore Bar Harbor’s history as you pass by centuries-old buildings.

image.alt: Acadia National Park & Bar Harbor Self-Guided Driving & Walking Tour

item.title: 2-Hour Windjammer Sailing Trip in Maine with Licensed Captain
item.description: Cruise through the scenic waters of Frenchman Bay during a leisurely sailing trip. Admire views of Acadia National Park in Maine during this sightseeing boat tour. Keep an eye out for wildlife including eagles, seals, and porpoises during the sail. Check out views of the Porcupine Islands from the spacious decks on board a Windjammer. Picnics are welcome on board.

image.alt: 2-Hour Windjammer Sailing Trip in Maine with Licensed Captain

item.title: Fat Tire E-Bike Rental in Bar Harbor
item.description: We offer robust fat tire e-bikes which are perfectly suited for the gravel terrain of Acadia's Carriage Roads, providing ample comfort and stability. These automobile-free roads offer intimate access to Jordan Pond House, Eagle Lake, Day Mountain, the Rockefeller bridges, and much more. Keep an eye out for wildlife such as: Bald Eagles, Deer, Porcupine, and Beavers (ask our staff where to find their homes). Our four hour rentals allow adventurers and families alike to comfortably explore 20-30 miles of the park. To ensure you get the most out of your trip, we will provide a map guide and share our personal recommendations along with easy to follow directions to the trails.

image.alt: Fat Tire E-Bike Rental in Bar Harbor

item.title: Historic Bar Harbor Self-Guided Walking Audio Tour Guide
item.description: Skip the slow-moving walking tours and tourist crowds—with this self-guided audio tour of Bar Harbor, you’ll dive into the city’s lavish past at your speed. Learning all about the city’s Gilded Age history, its love affair with lobster, and more, you’ll get a guided look at this seaside gem and plenty of ideas for your trip, no WiFi required.

image.alt: Historic Bar Harbor Self-Guided Walking Audio Tour Guide

item.title: Self-Guided Audio Driving Tour in Acadia National Park
item.description:
Download the GuideAlong self-guided audio tour and you'll discover more on your Acadia National Park road trip. Hear fascinating behind-the-scenes stories, local tips and directions play automatically, all based on your location.
You'll be guided to all of the area's famous highlights as well as lessor known gems including the highest point on the eastern seaboard, historic carriage roads that are considered the best example in the country of broken stone roads, and one of the most photographed lighthouses along the Maine Coast
Enjoy the freedom to explore offline at your own pace, spending more time at places that interest you, and bypass any that don’t.
✅ Stories, tips and directions play automatically based on your location ✅ Travel at your own pace ✅ Tour offline using GPS, no cell service or WiFi needed ✅ Suggested itineraries for half, full or multi day use ✅ No time limits or expiry, free updates ✅ Like having a tour guide along for the drive
Purchase one tour per vehicle.

image.alt: Self-Guided Audio Driving Tour in Acadia National Park

item.title: Self Guided GPS Audio Driving Tour Acadia NP From Hulls Cove VC
item.description: Discover Acadia National Park on a self guided driving tour. The stories play as you drive using GPS to know your location. Hear engaging stories, learn what's coming up, where to park, what to see and find the hidden gems like little hunters beach. One ticket is for one car, with as many as you can fit in the car. This tour starts at the Hulls Cove Visitors Center. From there you'll follow park loop around to the most famous sites. This smartphone guided tour points out what to see and tells you the stories as you drive. Go at your own pace, anytime. Want to stop? No problem. Continue anytime.

image.alt: Self Guided GPS Audio Driving Tour Acadia NP From Hulls Cove VC

item.title: The Way Life Should Be: 4-hr, Private Guided Tour of Acadia NP.
item.description: This tour is so much more than a few stops or stories for us to check off a list. I will create an experience you'll cherish as we explore Acadia and the many hidden gems just outside of the national park. No rush, no crowded bus. Just your group, riding in comfort, with a guide who never gets bored of sharing this island. When you let me handle the driving, you are free to really enjoy the scenery. I know all the secret ways to escape the press of crowded areas, while ensuring you don't miss a thing. I thrive on being able to find and share the places and information most meaningful to you. Our tour is fully customizable. A great tour leaves you full of the magic of this amazing place. Sure, there are stories, tour guide puns, pictures to take, names and dates you might forget... but mainly, the feeling of really experiencing this place in a special way. You will leave, knowing you saw and felt more, with less stress, than anyone choosing to explore without a local expert.

image.alt: The Way Life Should Be: 4-hr, Private Guided Tour of Acadia NP.

item.title: Bar Harbor Walking Tour
item.description:
Join us on a small group tour of scenic Bar Harbor, ME. The tour will start at the Village Green Park in the center of downtown. We will cover much of the downtown area, highlighting some of the most notable residents and what life was like long ago. Starting with the long history of Wabanaki summer stays, talk about early English settlements, and explore how the Hudson School of Art brought Bar Harbor to the attention of many. The tour typically last between 1 - 1.5 hours depending on the participation of you! Most of our tours are between 2-4 people, giving you a personalized experience you will not get anywhere else! Learn about the real Maine beyond the island and what it's like to live in this unique part of the world.
In case of inclement weather, we will reach out 24hrs prior if the tour will be cancelled or changed. In the case that we decide to not run the tour, full refunds will be issued.

image.alt: Bar Harbor Walking Tour

item.title: 1.Cape Town Airport Transfer (&Private tour trips during yo Stay)
item.description:
Your safety comes First!!! We specialise in Airport transfers & Private tours in Cape Town. Our prices below are only for Airport transfers to Individuals or Groups travellers. Press, Book now > Check availability button, to see the suitable Price/s for the number of travellers.
Make a booking with us for exceptional travel experience at competitively lower price.
Look no further, Reserve your Booking now and Pay Later.
To International travellers we offer Private transport and Tailored Tours during your stay in Cape Town. Contact MR-T (+27 74 266 1 627 ) your safety comes first. We cant wait to give you the best trip ever.

image.alt: 1.Cape Town Airport Transfer (&Private tour trips during yo Stay)

item.title: Mastering The Night Sky in Acadia National Park
item.description: Wildscape Adventures offers intimate astrophotography tours in Acadia National Park, focusing on personalized guidance, optimal shooting conditions, and eco-conscious practices. With small group sizes, expert instruction, and logistical support, participants can capture stunning images while respecting the environment.

image.alt: Mastering The Night Sky in Acadia National Park
